hero_subtitle: No feature bloat. Each product solves one problem exceptionally well — and they all work together seamlessly.

products.title: DC Launch
products.text: Go from idea to live site in under 10 minutes. Zero-config deployments with automatic SSL, CDN, and edge caching baked in.

products.title: DC Analytics
products.text: Privacy-first analytics with zero cookies. Track what matters — Core Web Vitals, conversion funnels, and user flows — without slowing your site.

products.title: DC Studio
products.text: A visual editor for developers. Design responsive layouts, manage content, and push updates — all without leaving your workflow.

reasons.title: No vendor lock-in
reasons.text: Export your code and data anytime. Your work is yours. We earn your renewal, we don’t trap you.

reasons.title: 99.9% uptime SLA
reasons.text: Backed by multi-region infrastructure and automated failover. Your site stays up when it matters most.

reasons.title: Human support, fast
reasons.text: Average first-response time: 4 minutes. No bots, no ticket queues. Real engineers who understand your stack.

cta_text: Spin up a project in 2 minutes. No credit card, no commitment — your first 14 days are on us.
